last_episode_to_air.name: Lost Fungies
last_episode_to_air.overview: Seth wants to discover an oasis in the desert, but failure has shattered his confidence! To help encourage his brother, Pascal draws Seth into a constellation. But Seth becomes too confident, and they soon end up in over their heads.

name: The Fungies!
overview: Seth, a young Fungie, wants to share his love of science with friends – but his search for adventure often stirs up trouble in prehistoric Fungietown, leading to hilarious and heartwarming surprises.

episodes.name: Let It Snowball
episodes.overview: Seth wants to bring snow home so it’ll earn him a coveted spot on his mom’s prized shelf of "stuff her kids gave her." When he repeatedly tries and fails to bring the snow back befoe it melts, he uses science to figure out a way to get it home intact.

episodes.name: Sick Day
episodes.overview: Seth, desperately wanting his classmates to pay attention to the presentations he’s excited to share with them, pushes himself too hard and gets sick! It takes a face-to-face encounter with his rival to show Seth that it doesn’t matter what his classmates think, as long as he likes what he’s doing.

episodes.name: Truffalo
episodes.overview: On the verge of a scientific discovery, Seth and the other Fancies are forced inside when the town is invaded by cow-like Truffalo! But when Seth traps the Truffalo in order to resume his science, he causes an environmental chain reaction that threatens to destroy Fancytown.

episodes.name: Green Eggs and Pam
episodes.overview: While exploring, Seth finds an egg and really wants to know what’s inside it! But when Pam’s egg-hatching instincts kick into gear, Seth will have to learn to trust her, and nature.

episodes.name: A Man and His Mustache
episodes.overview: When Seth borrows Pascal’s mustache for a day at the beach, the Triloknights think he’s an adult! While Seth loves the respect and attention, is he really ready for adulthood? And marriage?

episodes.name: Take Your Seth to Work Day
episodes.overview: Seth’s desire to help Nancy with her job at the hospital results in chaos when he, without Nancy’s knowledge, plays doctor on sick Fancies. Seth has to admit his wrongdoing and listen to his mom in order to set things right.

episodes.name: Voyage of the Rushroom
episodes.overview: Seth and Claudette are given a weekend project as punishment for disrupting class. But when Seth finds himself marooned on a boat in the middle of the ocean with Claudette, will he finally learn to listen? Or will the huge storm sink their ship?

episodes.name: The Twins Bug Seth
episodes.overview: Seth neglects his baby-sitting duties to do his own thing and winds up losing the twins to an army of ants! On his undercover mission to get back the Twins, Seth learns to appreciate his siblings even if they’re a little annoying at times.

episodes.name: Ghosts Schmosts
episodes.overview: Seth leads a group of kids into a haunted mine in an effort to prove that everything has a scientific explanation and that there’s no reason to be afraid ghosts. But things get spooky when they encounter a ghost that Seth doesn’t have a scientific explanation for. Seth has to learn to give into his fear in order to and solve the mystery of the mine ghost.

episodes.name: Hide and Pam/Chair Factory/Turtle/Rainy Day/Best Friends Club
episodes.overview: Hide and Pam: Pam learns to play hide and seek a little too well./Chair Factory: Seth improves productivity at the Fancytown chair factory./Turtle: Seth brings a shy turtle for show and tell./Rainy Day: Cool James teaches the other kids how to have fun making music on a rainy day./Best Friends Club: Lil' Lemon and Nevin hold the first meeting of the Best Friends Club.

episodes.name: Sir Tree's Body
episodes.overview: Seth wants to help sad, immobile Sir Tree feel the joy that comes from helping others, so he has the brilliant idea of planting Sir Tree inside Pascal’s body! But when Sir Tree’s absence causes soil erosion and mudslides, Seth has to convince Sir Tree that the best way to help is to return to his hole before Fancytown is destroyed.

episodes.name: Commander Beefy
episodes.overview: Seth, eager to explore the stars and find a fellow explorer, sends a signal to space. But the explorer who receives the message, Commander Beefy, has his own shady plans for Earth.

episodes.name: The Fanciest Fungie
episodes.overview: Seth, frustrated that the Fancies are too caught up in the Fanciest Fancy pageant to listen to his warning about a fungus-eating bacteria, enters the pageant to get his message out. But when he gets sucked into the pageant, he’ll have to face the consequences of getting distracted.

episodes.name: Snake It to the Limit
episodes.overview: When Seth agrees to let an athletic snake replace his arm so he can finally be good at volleyball, he learns he doesn’t need a fancy snake arm to make his teammates happy; he just needs to try.

episodes.name: Nevin's Cocoon
episodes.overview: After a beautiful statue makes Nevin self-conscious about his own looks, Seth helps seal Nevin in a cocoon so that he may turn into a beautiful butterfly.

episodes.name: Cool Kids
episodes.overview: When Pascal becomes obsessed with a group of cool kids, Seth promises to use his science skills to help Pascal become cool. But is coolness as cool as it seems?

episodes.name: Mermove Out
episodes.overview: Seth is having a hard time sharing a room with messy Pascal and needs a change. But instead of being honest about the situation, Seth makes Pascal a mermaid tail so that his brother can finally move out - into the ocean!

episodes.name: Happy Birthday Nancy
episodes.overview: Seth wants his mom to have the best birthday ever, so he creates his own currency in order to buy her an expensive gift. But he learns a little too late that counterfeiting is a crime, putting Nancy’s birthday at risk of being ruined.

episodes.name: New Pam in Town
episodes.overview: When Pam is chased by a huge scary dinosaur, a concerned Seth invites her to live with him in Fungietown. Pam adapts to city living, but the Fungies’ newfound love for Pam attracts attention, putting the entire town in danger!

episodes.name: Class Garden
episodes.overview: Seth tries to get the kids interested in his pumpkin garden by making it into a contest, but a healthy competition soon turns to all out war! Can Seth reunite the class to save the town from a new danger?

episodes.name: Free Squidly
episodes.overview: Seth takes a baby squid from the ocean to study and ends up becoming attached to the little guy. But when Squidly grows real big and attracts the attention of an intergalactic zookeeper, Seth must free his friend in order to save him.

episodes.name: Fungie Scouts
episodes.overview: Seth creates The Fungie Scouts so his friends can learn how to survive in the wild. But after enlisting the selfish Commander Beefy as scout leader, the kids wind up in danger! Seth must take back control in order to save his friends!

episodes.name: The Granny Trap
episodes.overview: The kids discover that Nevin’s Granny Grancie has an estranged sister/best friend, Granny Grindle. Nevin and Lil’ Lemon, with Seth’s help, vow to reunite them! But getting these old friends back together may test their own friendship.

episodes.name: Nancy's Fireman Calendar
episodes.overview: While distracted by a new scientific endeavor, Seth winds up ruining his mom’s treasured fireman calendar! After his attempt to make it up to her puts them both in danger, Seth finally learns the importance of communicating with his mom.

episodes.name: The Well Monster
episodes.overview: Seth wants to study the old well, but Nancy forbids it! So Seth lies and says he won’t. But when Pascal gets stuck in the well, Seth’s little white lie grows! Soon he has the whole town up in arms about a terrible “well monster.”

episodes.name: Queen Seth
episodes.overview: Seth, sick of doing chores for his mom, wishes he was in charge. But when an act of kindness makes Seth queen to a hive of bees, he quickly learns: heavy is the head that wears the crown.

episodes.name: Sir Tree's Boy
episodes.overview: Seth agrees to take care of Sir Tree’s wooden boy, Boy Joy, but quickly pawns him off on Mertha. When Seth discovers that Sir Tree needs his boy back in order to survive, he must stage a heist to steal Boy Joy back before it’s too late!

episodes.name: Mr. Pascal's Opus
episodes.overview: Seth writes a play about the importance of dental hygiene and gets Pascal to direct. Soon the brothers’ differences lead to Pascal quitting. But when the star of the show gets stage fright right before curtain, Seth has to get Pascal back!

episodes.name: Lil' Lemon for President
episodes.overview: Seth bets Mertha that with him as his campaign manager, Lil’ Lemon will beat her in the class election! But when Mertha’s dad gets involved, things get out of hand and Seth soon learns politics isn’t worth putting his friend in jeopardy!

episodes.name: Long Legs
episodes.overview: While playing in the river, Seth, Claudette, and Mertha discover the longest pair of Fungie legs they’ve ever seen! Now the three friends struggle over who gets to keep them.

episodes.name: Sir Tree House
episodes.overview: Sir Tree is lonely, so Seth builds a treehouse in his branches to keep him company. It’s such a hit, soon all of Fungietown moves in! But when the added weight strains Sir Tree, can Seth convince him to take better care of himself?

episodes.name: Lord Clawly Caper
episodes.overview: When his medals are stolen during a Fungietown school assembly, Seth and Claudette start an investigation to find the culprit before everyone is thrown into the Triloknight’s dungeon!

episodes.name: What About Cool James?
episodes.overview: Seth wants some attention, but his family’s too busy. But when a lucky explosion forces Cool James to stay with him, Seth gets the attention he craves! That is until Seth sees how much his family loves Cool James.

episodes.name: Dino Club
episodes.overview: Pressured to choose a real job, Seth instead decides to be a dinosaur like Pam! Soon, all the kids follow suit, but cause so much trouble, Fungietown bans dinosaurs! But Pam can’t stop being a dinosaur and is thrown in jail!

episodes.name: Commander Lazer
episodes.overview: Seth gets super into solving puzzles and winds up trying to solve the ultimate puzzle: fixing Commander Beefy’s relationship with his sister, COMMANDER LAZER! Will Seth’s plan work? Or will it end up putting him and his friends in danger?

episodes.name: Fungopolis
episodes.overview: Seth’s learning about Fungie history in class, but there isn’t enough history! So he assembles an archeology crew to help him dig! But when the kids unearth the ancient city of Fungopolis, will they be stuck in the past forever?

episodes.name: Pam Runs Forever
episodes.overview: Seth loves how fast Pam can run, and to prove she’s the fastest, creates a race all across Young Earth! But when Pam, who’s never lost a race, is challenged by a speedy newcomer, will Seth’s training be enough to make sure she wins?

episodes.name: RFUN Radio
episodes.overview: Overworked radio DJ Jason Fungie needs a break, so Seth and his friends take over RFUN public radio! But when things backfire and the station is at risk of being shut down, the kids have to raise the money to keep RFUN alive!

episodes.name: Where's Coach?
episodes.overview: The school's Fungieball coach is missing! And worse–Seth’s mom is his replacement! Champsa, who shares a bond with Coach, teams up with Seth, forming an uneasy alliance of Sports and Science in an attempt to find Coach Croach!

episodes.name: One Night at Nevin's
episodes.overview: Seth is off to his first sleepover at Nevin’s. But when Seth’s determination to have the “perfect sleepover” leads to calamity, Nevin may never get to have friends over again.

episodes.name: Bird War
episodes.overview: Seth and Claudette scale the cliffs outside of town and get caught in a cold war between rival flying dino families! Can Seth help a pair of star-crossed dino lovers live happily ever after? Or will his good intentions lead to a bird war?

episodes.name: Bed Bugs
episodes.overview: Lil’ Lemon and Nevin spend every day together, but when Lemon develops an interest in bugs, which Nevin hates, he sneaks off to hunt them with Seth. Will jealousy and a failure to communicate destroy their friendship?

episodes.name: Beefo the Kid
episodes.overview: After angering some space bullies, Commander Beefy seeks protection by going undercover as a Fungie kid at Seth’s school. But will Beefy blow his cover when he helps out with the school fundraiser?

episodes.name: Where the Truffalo Roam
episodes.overview: When Seth accidentally blocks the path to a herd of Truffalos’ grazing lands, he must saddle up in order to lead them to dinner. But guiding wild animals is harder than Seth expected!

episodes.name: Seth the Frog
episodes.overview: After breaking a lawn ornament belonging to the mysterious Madam Fungulia, Seth gets turned into a frog! Or at least that’s what his friends think. Can they break into Madam Fugulia’s house and change Seth back?

episodes.name: Home, Run!
episodes.overview: After her house is invaded by wild crabs, Nancy becomes overprotective of her babies and buys a super-advanced security system from Commander Beefy. But when Pascal accidentally sets it off, the house becomes the threat!

episodes.name: The Scoop
episodes.overview: Claudette needs a good story for the school paper and gets the scoop she's been looking for after following Seth to a secret dance club. But printing the story has a downside that makes Claudette question how far one should go for a scoop.

episodes.name: Flawless
episodes.overview: After getting an “F” in behavior, Seth discovers that he can change his personality by scooping out different sections of his Fungie head! But when the flawed head goop he tossed comes to life, will flawless Seth be able to save the day?

episodes.name: Smarty Flower
episodes.overview: When Seth is paired with underachiever Cleo on a project, he gives her a “smarty flower” to trick her into thinking she’s smarter. But when the flower wilts, Cleo puts herself in danger trying to get a new one!

episodes.name: Campfire Creepies
episodes.overview: In this Halloween special, Seth and his friends go camping to see a meteor shower! But when they decide to pass the time telling campfire stories, things get pretty spooky. Can Seth keep people around until the meteor shower hits?

episodes.name: I Hear You
episodes.overview: Pascal gets a conch shell stuck in his head, giving him super-hearing and attracting the attention of a crab gang who want to use his powers for crimes! Will Pascal learn how to actually listen in time to free himself?

episodes.name: Twinseparable
episodes.overview: Stuck babysitting the rowdy Twins with Pascal, Seth decides it would be easier to split them up. But Seth and Pascal soon learn that they must reunite the Twins or they’ll stay separate forever!

episodes.name: For Keeps
episodes.overview: Seth wants to create a cool new game that will be a playground hit! But will his desire to please everyone cost them their limbs?

episodes.name: Tina Turnip
episodes.overview: Sir Tree thinks he’s found his one true love: a turnip named Tina. But after realizing Sir Tree is just lying to himself about being happy, Seth has to help his friend realize that real life doesn’t have to play out like a fairy tale.

episodes.name: The Mayor's Apprentice
episodes.overview: When Mertha tells her dad she doesn’t want to be mayor when she grows up, he’s forced to find a new successor... SETH! But can the town handle “Seth, the junior mayor?”

episodes.name: Gorbo Gets Flushed
episodes.overview: When Seth is put in charge of watching the class pet, Gorbo, Lil’ Lemon gets jealous. But Lil’ Lemon’s plan to “save” Gorbo backfires when he’s flushed down the toilet! Can Lil’ Lemon and Seth save their class pet from the sewer?

episodes.name: Rattlesnake Jane
episodes.overview: The Fungies are celebrating Hero-Ween, and Mertha is obsessed with the Fungie folk hero Rattlesnake Jane. But when Mertha learns her hero wasn’t everything she thought she was, can Seth restore her faith?

episodes.name: Special Bloom
episodes.overview: Sir Tree is growing a once-in-a-lifetime special bloom for Seth to see! But when Seth loses his eye and risks missing the bloom, will some advice from a wiser Fungie be enough to save the day?

episodes.name: Meteor Madness
episodes.overview: A meteor crashes into the playground, barely missing Shania! Seth wants to study the meteor, but Shania decides that it’s magic and starts a meteor fan club. Can Seth debunk their meteor myths before they tear the school apart?

episodes.name: Camping with the Family
episodes.overview: After hearing how great Anna Nanna’s family is, Nancy gets insecure and takes Seth and the kids camping to prove they’re a great family too. But when they run into Anna, family fun becomes very competitive and no fun at all!

episodes.name: Hugbear Hullabaloo
episodes.overview: DLil’ Lemon goes to great lengths to get their sister, Lil’ Lime, the best birthday present ever. But how far is too far… and will the present tear Lil’ Lime’s birthday party to pieces?

episodes.name: Shania's Place
episodes.overview: It’s Shania’s turn to host the Fungietown Breakfast Club, but she's embarrassed by her house! After convincing the other kids she lives in a cool cave behind a waterfall, what will happen when she finds something already living there?

episodes.name: Pam's Big Break
episodes.overview: After breaking both her legs, Pam finds it impossible to rest, until Seth sets her up in his attic with a view of the apartment building next door for some chill fungie-watching. She isn’t interested… until faced with a captivating mystery.

episodes.name: You've Got Whale
episodes.overview: When Pascal falls in love, his insecurities lead him to pretend to be something he’s not: a giant prehistoric whale! But when Pascal’s dishonesty endangers his brother, it’s up to Nancy to save Seth before he’s digested.

episodes.name: Beefy Cruise
episodes.overview: Hoping to spot an iceberg, Seth convinces Pascal to captain Beefy’s cruise ship. But when Pascal becomes determined to destroy the iceberg, Seth must try to bring his brother back to reality.

episodes.name: Billy Fungie
episodes.overview: Seth and his friends win tickets to a Billy Fungie concert, where they discover that Billy is actually three different fungies combined! But when the friends accidentally break Billy up, they must reunite him before the town goes nuts.

episodes.name: Pascal's Big Fan
episodes.overview: When Pascal’s dream of having his art in the Fungarium is shattered, he runs away to mope. There, a dangerous spinosaurus falls in love with his paintings! But what will Pascal do when the Spino becomes too big a fan?

episodes.name: Sir Tree's Sick
episodes.overview: After giving Sir Tree root rot, Seth promises to do everything he can to make his friend feel better. But soon Sir Tree gets a little too used to Seth’s attention, and pretends to be sick even when he’s better!

episodes.name: Virtual Boys
episodes.overview: When Seth and Pascal get stuck inside on a rainy day, they decide to buy a VR game from Commander Beefy. It’s all fun and games until Seth’s competitiveness hurts Pascal’s feelings – and gets him trapped in the game!

episodes.name: Too Many Grandpas
episodes.overview: Nevin can’t get enough love from Grannie Grancie, but there’s only so much she can give! Nevin and his friends decide to set Granny up with four eligible grandpas, but when the plan backfires, will they be able to get rid of the suitors?

episodes.name: Messy Locker
episodes.overview: Seth hates cleaning, so he gets help tidying up his locker from Commander Beefy – who turns the mess into a gross monster! Can Seth buckle down and clean up this mess monster before it destroys the school?

episodes.name: The Edge
episodes.overview: After a run-in with some crabs, Pam worries she’s lost her “edge,” so she recruits Seth for a trip to the Badlands to help get it back. A tough old ankylosaur named Scrandice helps, but will her harsh lessons be too much for Seth and Pam?

episodes.name: Simple Beefy
episodes.overview: When Beefy is forced to crash with Sir Tree after losing everything to his sister, Sir Tree teaches him the wonders of living simply.

episodes.name: Nancy and the Rodeo
episodes.overview: Wanting to make her kids happy, Nancy joins a rodeo put on by The Mayor. But Seth, Pascal, and The Twins are only doing the rodeo because they think it’ll make Nancy happy! Will this family learn to communicate before it’s too late?

episodes.name: Teacher Terry's Day Off
episodes.overview: After Teacher Terry takes a much-needed day off, the class secretly works on a plan to keep her relaxed. But when Teacher Terry notices the unseen forces, she assumes she’s the victim of a conspiracy.

episodes.name: The Lord & the Layabout
episodes.overview: Hoping to escape his obligations, Lord Clawly switches places with Pascal to enjoy a day at the fair. But Pascal isn’t caught up on all his Lordly protocols and ends up in a joust to the death.

episodes.name: Mifflin's Replacement
episodes.overview: Everyone thinks Nevin’s new kitten is better than his older cat, Mifflin. But when Seth discovers the kitten is really a tiny Fungie burglar in disguise, it’s up to Mifflin to stop the thief and save Seth!

episodes.name: Mission Shania
episodes.overview: When Seth and Shania‘s plans see a movie are derailed by Shania’s obligations at home, Seth steps in, but his lack of understanding about his friend’s home life soon leads to catastrophe.

episodes.name: Miner's Market
episodes.overview: To prove he’s old enough to ride with his dads on the mine carts, Holk is put in charge of their table at the Miner’s Market. But when Holk loses valuable black opals, he must get them back before his dads find out!

episodes.name: Lost Fungies
episodes.overview: Seth wants to discover an oasis in the desert, but failure has shattered his confidence! To help encourage his brother, Pascal draws Seth into a constellation. But Seth becomes too confident, and they soon end up in over their heads.
